interactivity.requirements: Sunday You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Bad News Bears " from Chinami Chosokabe
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Visit New Hope Cathedral during the morning.

progression.synopsis: Sensei wakes up in New Hope Cathedral , finding 79 and Moyo waiting there for his arrival. The former asks for his assistance in filling a bucket, but not before inviting him to ruminate over the tragedies of his childhood, the state of Kumon-mi's cycles, and his own failings as a person.
trivia: During the event, the song "whatifyouare" plays on loop. In addition to the sound of a child crying, and a robotic rendition of the song "Daisy Bell", there is a backwards TTS message overlaid atop it. A transcript can be found below: "Bucket, bucket, wonderful bucket. Sticks and twigs and grass and cum. Bucket, bucket, lovely old bucket. Tear off my arms and bite off my tongue."
"Bucket, bucket, wonderful bucket. Sticks and twigs and grass and cum. Bucket, bucket, lovely old bucket. Tear off my arms and bite off my tongue."
At the beginning of the event, an image with a hexadecimal message is briefly seen. The decoded message can be found below:

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.26p2.
